title: I Became the Emperor’s Cat
summary:
After my sudden death, I was reincarnated in a strange world with a sultan and his harem, but not as a person, but as a kitten who can't talk!

I can only become human by kissing a prince who is worthy of the sultan...

After mistaking me for an assassin and treating me coldly, Prince Soliman says, "......It's soft, it's warm, can we stay here for a while?" as he approached me.

Prince Theron, who I thought was a sweetheart, seduces me by whispering, "Choose me over my brother, and I will give you everything you want." "I will give you everything you want," he whispered, seducing me.

I can't stay human unless I kiss one of them. "Nyaaong!" (Headache!)
How do I survive in this royal palace?

title: The Genius Mage Who Uses His Fists
summary:
Zed, a former MMA champion, wakes up in the body of a scrawny prisoner in a fantasy world. Reborn as a member of the once-feared Arahan family, he’s trapped inside a brutal magical internment camp. With no spells at his disposal, Zed trains his body to become a living weapon. He escapes the prison with his only ally Riu, a sharp-witted inmate. Now hunted by both a ruthless warden and a noble house, Zed must fight his way to freedom only with his fists. Can a man with no magic change the rules of a world built on it?   

---

**Original Webtoon:**   
- [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=836657)
- [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=12255262)   

**Official Translations:**   
- [English](https://www.webtoons.com/en/action/the-fistfighting-genius-mage/list?title_no=8018)
- [T.Chinese](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/the-fistfighting-genius-mage/list?title_no=8220)

title: S-Class Butler
summary:
Butler Kim is the raid leader of the VR game Metariaand in real life the guardian of two cats. One day, a mysterious boss forces him into the unwanted Butler class, where he must serve monsters and do menial chores.

Just as he begins adjusting to this strange new role, an unbelievable truth is revealed:

"A cat… logged into the game?!"

His beloved pet Peechu has entered Metaria.

But Peechu is not just Peechu. The "Master" who reclassified Butler Kim and has been giving him orders is actually Kalinas, the Incarnation of Darkness, now trapped inside the cat’s body.

With the world’s balance at stake, Butler Kim is tasked with carrying out Kalinas’s dark mission. Yet instead of worrying about the will of darkness, is he simply happy to adventure through a fantasy world with Peechu?

title: Youth Lovesome
summary:
"It may be hazy blue, but that's alright"

Taking place a year after the epilogue of Seasons of Blossom, this story focuses on the new opening of “Cafe Blossom and NEMONE Atelier” as well as Bomi’s new classmate “Pureum” as they explore a new found youth. 

Campus romance, after school romance, office romance, it has it all.  

The heartwarming series is back with another youthful story!

title: It’s voice phishing, but it’s a life reversal
summary: No summary available.

title: The Saint Who Wishes for Death Makes a Pact with the Cursed Prince
Gatekeeper Of The Boundless World
summary:
When the planet perishes and the gods fall, the collapse of the magical realm leaves humanity without any protectors. Now, "Anomalies" and "Catastrophes" begin to invade the human realm . As the Dark Age descends, a soul from Blue Star (Earth) is unexpectedly transported into this dying realm.

---

**Original Manhua**:
- [Acqq](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/656128)

**Official Translations:**     
- [English](https://www.webnovel.com/comic/myriad-realms-gatekeeper_31705778300125301)
- [Japanese](https://jp.piccoma.com/web/product/182941)

title: I Won’t Forgive My Stepsister This Time Around!
I Won’t Forgive My Stepsister This Time Around!
Your Ryan
summary:
For centuries the Lee and Dai had shared a deep bond in the form of a master-servant relationship which gradually evolved into a strong friendship between the heirs of both families. Therefore true to tradition Dai Xiaodao (aka Dai Xiaoshuang) decides to assume the role of the manservant for Li Qingri (aka childhood friend) in place of her dead brother, Dai Dadao.   
  
To her chagrin, pretending to be a boy was but the tip of the iceberg in terms of the list of challenges that would come her way. On top of having to contain her secret love for Li Qingri who has become her roommate… what's the deal with that sinister-looking senpai (who's always flashing some fish at her) and that sweet-looking female classmate (who's really a carnivore in herbivore's clothing)!   
  
All that aside, what was that mysteriously beautiful scent that Dai Xiaodao got a whiff of when she bumped into the notorious Ye Weien at that secret path? Surely, no matter what the legend says, that obnoxious playboy could not be the man of her destiny!

title: Obsession Syndrome
summary:
“They came looking for me. The secret from back then has already been uncovered by them. If we want to save him, we must kill the other one.”  

A letter from the orphanage mother after years of silence pulls Green back into the nightmare of his childhood. Soon after, Green sees *them* again at her funeral—his childhood friends, Chen Zeyu and Tao Ye.  

The three move into Tao Ye’s small Western-style house and begin to test each other’s sincerity.  Who must be killed? Who is to be saved? And what role does Green play in all of this? Who is that boy—vague in memory, yet the one who once stirred Green’s heart?

title: A Capable Maid
summary:
As Maurina, she's on the run as the last of her kingdom’s royal line. Disguised as Marie, she is just a maid, serving the victorious empire. She’s never been very good at anything, so when she's told to make a wish, she asks for the ability to help others and bring them happiness. Now as visions of brilliant and skilled people fill her dreams, she’s imbued with a bounty of abilities perfectly suited for any dilemma. But will her secrets last as the crown prince seeks out both Maurina and Marie?

---
[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=53159698)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/a-talented-maid/info)
* [Simplified Chinese / 汉语](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/647461)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Marie-Sang-Pelayan-Berbakat/3337)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/35253)

title: Too Much Regeneration! Now the King Obsesses Over Me
The Back-Alley Mage’s Return
summary:
Aster, a troublemaker from the Dequlan family of magicians, who used to be a vagrant. He runs away for freedom, but is eventually caught and loses his life.

But when he opens his eyes, he finds himself back in his vagrant days in the black-and-white zone...!

“I will build the library that was my comrades' dream, no, I will build a tower even greater than that!”
“As a bonus, I will display the Deculanga Vision Book on the first floor.”

Aster's return to life as a vagabond!

title: I Hired a Villain as My Housekeeper
Love’s Impossible Quest: For the Broken young lady and the Duke of Dread
Monster Eater
summary:
Rude is an adventurer who makes a living by collecting medicinal herbs in dungeons filled with miasma, relying on his unique skill [Abnormal Status Nullification]. Because of this, other adventurers avoid him because he smells like miasma, and he cannot form a party, so he is derided as a miasma diver. Then, a new labyrinth is discovered, and Rude is invited to join a party that needs him as a baggage carrier. In order to change the situation, he challenges the labyrinth. However, after encountering a powerful monster in the labyrinth, the adventurers who accompanied him betray Rude and abandoned him as a decoy...

After a life-or-death battle with the monster, he is injured, loses all his supplies, and is in a desperate situation. With the monster’s corpse lying before him, Rude tries to survive by gambling on the forbidden monster food...

title: One Day I Found a Husband
summary: One morning, Kyuya wakes up to find that he's bedded a bear. That bear is Hozumi, an older man with a scruffy beard and a penchant for clinging to Kyuya and calling him "Kyu-chan". Hozumi's desperate behavior is a big turn-off for Kyuya. However, Kyuya slowly learns that there is more to Hozumi's desperation than he could have imagined.

title: Too Much Regeneration! Now the King Obsesses Over Me
The Back-Alley Mage’s Return
summary:
Aster, a troublemaker from the Dequlan family of magicians, who used to be a vagrant. He runs away for freedom, but is eventually caught and loses his life.

But when he opens his eyes, he finds himself back in his vagrant days in the black-and-white zone...!

“I will build the library that was my comrades' dream, no, I will build a tower even greater than that!”
“As a bonus, I will display the Deculanga Vision Book on the first floor.”

Aster's return to life as a vagabond!

Love’s Impossible Quest: For the Broken young lady and the Duke of Dread
Monster Eater

title: One Day I Found a Husband
summary: One morning, Kyuya wakes up to find that he's bedded a bear. That bear is Hozumi, an older man with a scruffy beard and a penchant for clinging to Kyuya and calling him "Kyu-chan". Hozumi's desperate behavior is a big turn-off for Kyuya. However, Kyuya slowly learns that there is more to Hozumi's desperation than he could have imagined.

title: The Prostitute Plays The Role Of A Queen
Pseudo Love
summary: Baek Ga-in is a university student doing multiple jobs, living a double life as a demon worship concept streamer 'Lucia.' She has been carrying past scars of being entangled within a cult but suddenly her stream attracts a real demon, an 'incubus'?! A demon, human and... an angel?! This is not a 'cult' it is that campus fantasy romance!!

title: Queen of the Veil
summary: I have a stepsister named Isuzu. She is a super popular VTuber with over 1 million subscribers, "Isuzu Wine". One day, she forgot to turn off her stream, and our candid conversation was accidentally broadcasted worldwide! The clip of the streaming incident quickly went viral, and overnight, I became an internet sensation...!? The more accidents happen, the more popular she gets!! Together with my overly beautiful and clingy stepsister, and a cute senior VTuber, I aim to rise in the streaming industry!

title: The Empress’s Concubine Scandal
summary: No summary available.

title: Pseudo Love
summary: Baek Ga-in is a university student doing multiple jobs, living a double life as a demon worship concept streamer 'Lucia.' She has been carrying past scars of being entangled within a cult but suddenly her stream attracts a real demon, an 'incubus'?! A demon, human and... an angel?! This is not a 'cult' it is that campus fantasy romance!!

title: Queen of the Veil
summary: I have a stepsister named Isuzu. She is a super popular VTuber with over 1 million subscribers, "Isuzu Wine". One day, she forgot to turn off her stream, and our candid conversation was accidentally broadcasted worldwide! The clip of the streaming incident quickly went viral, and overnight, I became an internet sensation...!? The more accidents happen, the more popular she gets!! Together with my overly beautiful and clingy stepsister, and a cute senior VTuber, I aim to rise in the streaming industry!

title: The Empress’s Concubine Scandal
summary: No summary available.

title: My Daddy Hides His Power
summary:
Q: Describe your feelings upon discovering your trusted dad isn’t just an extra.
A: W-what the heck... Give me back my ‘Random Imperial Citizen #1’ life...

Living in a world of constant war—365 days of chaos—a simple, extra's existence was a blessing.
At least, that's what I thought.

In a small village, I enjoyed a humble life with my loving, ordinary father, James Brown, 27, the epitome of an unremarkable single dad.

Or so I believed.

“Ladies and gentlemen, presenting my father! The quintessential symbol of extras everywhere! Brown hair, brown eyes, plain and simple!”
“...”
“This man screams ‘background character,’ living a quiet life chopping wood in a mountain village with his adorable daughter. Right? ...RIGHT?”

The knight commander merely stared at me in silence.

And then, the unthinkable happened.

Behind me, my father’s worn staff began to glow with a strange, blue aura.

“...Dad?”

Before I could process what was happening, his unassuming brown hair and eyes shifted. Slowly but surely, they transformed into...

Shimmering silver locks and piercing blue eyes—practically shouting “I’m the protagonist!”

“WHAT?!”

My simple, extra life shattered into a million pieces as my dad—no, this mysterious powerhouse—gripped his weapon and snarled:
“Give me back my daughter, you bastard.”

title: Deadlines are Raining in the Status Window
summary: A masterpiece of over 3,000 volumes, I was incarnated into “Dawn of Repentance.” Moreover, as the successor to the duke’s family, facing a grim fate, I became my cherished character, “Mitchell Nephtis.” But upon opening the status window, the countdown to death was D-3. With the thought that I couldn’t die like this, I somehow managed to survive, and each time I changed the development, experience points were granted?! If that’s the case, I’ll change the original storyline drastically to reap the benefits. Leaving the deceased “Michell Nephtys” aside, I lived as the nanny’s daughter, “Evan Laeff,” doing as told, but missions kept pouring in on the status window, and failure meant death. Now that it’s like this, whether the storyline changes or not doesn’t matter. I will definitely survive and prevail

title: I’m Done Being a Hero, Even If It’s Retirement
summary: Everyone's shocked when 9-year-old prodigy Adelia Ester suddenly refuses to enroll in the elite knights' academy. They don't know that Adelia was magically sent back in time after wasting her life on the battlefield and suffering an early death! Now, Adelia's out to protect her peace from her ex-boss, the evil future emperor, by setting her ally on the throne instead. Will Adelia succeed in one last mission and finally retire for good? Or will she find herself forced to be a hero once more?

title: The adopted daughter-in-law wants to leave
summary:
I possessed the body of the no. 1 villainess, Ellie, who was a terrible person who tormented the Male Lead in the orphanage. I quietly waited until the day that the Duke would pick him up vowed to never get caught up in the novel, so she would not see the ugly ending that the villainess did, until...

"I will also adopt the child next to him too... she will become my daughter-in-law."

I was adopted along with the Male Lead! I can’t just do this? There’s a separate heroine!

---
I have possessed the extremely cruel villainess who tormented the male lead during his childhood days in the orphanage.

To change my fate, I decided “Just don’t do that,” but the pitiful boy kept getting beaten up by the other kids anyway, so I had to keep an eye on him even more!

Then one day, his father's best friend the Duke, who had been searching for the male lead for 10 years, finally found the orphanage. 

“I'll adopt this child here. Oh, and the child next to him too.”

Wait, why am I also getting adopted?!

He wants me as his daughter-in-law for the male lead?!? 

What about the female lead??

—

Just like in the original novel, the male lead joined his adoptive father in the war. 

He was supposed to return from the battlefield with the female lead, so I carefully prepared for a divorce and made a lot of money so I can live by myself! But…

“Damian, did you come home alone? Did no one else come with you?”

“Someone else?” Upon hearing my question, Damian’s gaze suddenly sharpened.

“Ellie. are you looking for a man other than your husband?” 

“Huh?”

“That's no good, I would probably kill that man out of jealousy.”

I looked over to my father-in-law for help.

“I also agree, Ellie. You shouldn’t betray your husband ever...”

title: I Can’t Wait To Eat You
summary: Outstanding talent. A look that won't be overlooked no matter where you are. A prosperous family. I lived by walking only on well-paved paths. Everything was so perfect to the point that it was boring. Then one day when I turned 30... Taejun Kim impulsively deviates from the path. To meet ‘Han So-eun’, the daughter of the driver who took his parents’ lives. 'With what kind of face did you come to this company?' The shameless face was disgusting. So he decided to stick around and torment her. Like a person who is impatient because he can't eat... “I think the director likes..."

title: I Need to Raise My Sister Properly
summary:
Her favorite character's fate is in her hands.
A woman's dream comes true when she transmigrates into the body of Rachel Agnes, sister of Liz Agnes — her favorite story villain. Her mission? Ensure that Liz goes down a better path. Yet, things become more complicated than expected, especially when a notorious archduke is thrown into the mix...

title: The Real Daughter, She Is an Almighty Boss
summary: A highly skilled fighter wakes up in someone else's body and discovers that she's the Huffmans' lost daughter Gemma, regarded as socially inferior to her adoptive sister and a human punching bag for her Aunt Elodie. Her father doesn't care about her. Her mother is ashamed of her. Just when everyone thinks Gemma is going to make a complete fool of herself, they get a slap in the face.

title: I Was Reincarnated as the Spoiled Baby Empress
A Fortune-Telling Princess
summary:
A story about an unattractive second-year student, Sakagami, being teased around by a mysterious first-year student who is good at fortune-telling, Mizuki-senpai… But at the same time is actually showing signs that she likes him…

A frustrating and strange romcom begins!

title: I Want to Live Life Effortlessly
summary: A boy named Atsumu was branded as "useless" by his famous sisters and banished from his entertainment-industry family. However, hidden within him was an extraordinarily talented "behind-the-scenes support" skill that neither he nor his family had noticed! After transferring schools, Atsumu is now determined to live a normal life, but as he crosses paths with talented entertainers—VTubers, idols, and models—his natural ability starts to shine, making him their indispensable support. They can't help but adore him, turning his simple wish for normality into a showbiz underdog success story!

title: Limited Extra Time
summary:
As the middle child who is neither the heir nor the cherished younger twins, Karina has lived her whole life hidden away from others. She, who only had one hobby of painting, found out that she only had one year left to live. So without a plan, she went to visit her fiancé who she barely knew… To annul the engagement as he always wanted.

"I won’t beat around the bush. I want to spend a year here."

"...Milady, have you gone crazy?"

"In return, I'll agree to annul the engagement."

But, she didn't know then. That she would receive the unconditional love that she had never received her whole life from him, and that she would come to have a desire to live her once meaningless life.

---
Though gifted with an ability to bring her drawings to life, Karina Leopold spent her years in the shadow of her famous siblings, forced to be the good daughter her parents wanted. But when she's told that a deadly disease will kill her in a year, she offers a deal to her fiancé, Milian Pastellio, with the goal to live the remainder of her days far from her family's reach. Much to her surprise, their encounter proceeds to change them both in a way she never imagined...

---
[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/52783700)

**Official English Translation of the Novel:** [Radish](https://radishfiction.com/stories/29265), [Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/karinas-last-days-novel/info)

title: Mercenary Enrollment
summary:
At the age of eight, Ijin Yu lost his parents in a plane crash and became stranded in a foreign land, forced to become a child mercenary in order to stay alive. 

He returns home ten years later to be reunited with his family in Korea, where food and shelter are plenty and everything seems peaceful. But Ijin will soon learn that life as a teenager is a whole other feat of survival. With only one year of high school left, Ijin must master new tactics to maneuver his way around the schoolhouse battleground.

Can he survive a year of high school? Or rather, will the school be able to survive him?

title: Grand Duke of the North
summary:
I became the sister of the villain, who shed no blood or tears in a war-ridden novel! I thought I was born again as the youngest daughter of a noble family, but I'm the little sister of a villain who's only being used!  
  
A baby's body too fragile to survive in the Lagrange household, a brutal family that makes children fight for successors… I've decided to stick to the villain in order to live!  
  
I need you to be my guardian until I run away from here. Raise me, villain!  


---

title: How to Make My Tyrant Husband Love Me
summary:
[from cotton candy scans]  
  
“You guys are married from now on."  
  
The person I’ve admired for so long suddenly becomes my husband?! Takatsuki Honoka, 22 years old. I’ve been crushing on someone since I was in high school. He’s my father’s subordinate, the cool and handsome, yet super kind Nagakura Kousuke-san. One day, Kousuke-san suddenly becomes my husband!  
  
Official English translation on Comico's [Pocket Comics app](https://www.comico.io/pocket-comics) (color edition)

title: Rust
summary:
In this world, when you turn twelve, God gives you a special weapon called a sacred weapon. Rust, a boy living in a remote village, dreams of becoming an adventurer with his childhood friend Ruby. Ruby receives the highest rank, A, but Rust receives a battered, F-ranked rusty sword. Unlike his childhood friend who was recruited by a top-ranked party, Rust was told that his dream of becoming an adventurer would never come true, but he didn’t give up and decided to fight with his rusty sword. He defeats weak monster little by little and steadily strengthens his rusty sword.

Eventually, after three years, the Rusty Sword finally reached weapon level 10. At that time, a skill awakened in the rusty sword, and it evolved into an overpowered magical sword.

title: The Script-Eating Actor
summary:
"Jaehee, why do you always carry two copies of the script?"
"Well, I might lose one."

That’s a lie.
One is for carrying around on set and showing to others.
The other one is for—

[The drama Youth Train is available for absorption.]
[Would you like to absorb it?]

I use it for eating.
I devour the script and make it completely my own.

The story of Jaehui, an actor who can absorb a script 100%.

title: Bullshit
summary:
When CEO Jung Taeon mentioned he would stay for a month at Yeonghwadang, Sahee didn’t think much of it. He was merely a valued guest who would never get involved with someone as insignificant as her. However, the rude and endlessly arrogant man had a different perspective.

“Yeon Sahee, why don’t we sleep together?”

Sahee felt a mix of discomfort and unease, but his unpredictable demeanor continues to unsettle her..
